row.process:
! --------------------------------------------- :SET &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'BBSEreignisRente_Hanse_Gener' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&GEN_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &LOGA_OPT# = 'N' ! --------------------------------------------- ! ! LIST_KOLL (Eingabe) -> in Array :DEFINE &LIST_KOLL_ARRAY#, string, 10 :FILL &LIST_KOLL_ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LIST_KOLL#,",")
cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VALUTA = &VALUTA# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# VTRNR_VON = &AB_VTR_NR# VTRNR_BIS = &BIS_VTR_NR# :SET &COUNT# = 1 :WHILE &COUNT# LE 10 : IF &LIST_KOLL_ARRAY#[&COUNT#] <> "" : DATA LIST_KOLL = &LIST_KOLL_ARRAY#[&COUNT#] : ENDIF : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDWHILE TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# BESCHREIBUNG = &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# LOGA = &LOGA_OPT# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
